value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|NGYAAH! A m-monster! I'm too
young to be eaten!$k$p$EFace|...Huh? Oh. It's just a bird, I guess.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Maybe heading off to the Tower
of Niðavellir alone wasn't a great
idea after all...$k$pI'm not sure I can make it all the
way by myself...$k$p$EFace_Anger|No! I can't get discouraged now!
My country and my brothers need
me more than ever!$k$p$EFace|The foothills should be on the other
side of this forest. If I just keep going
this way, I should get there soon!$k$pI'll just have to do my best!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...inn...$k$p...Reg...inn...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|...Huh? Wh-who's there? I can hear
your voice, but I can't see anyone!
Are you...over this way?$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Phew... This is exhausting! And the
Tower of Niðavellir is higher still?
This slope is so steep...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We'll make it, Sharena... There, look.
You can see it now, over there.$k$pThat is our goal, the Tower
of Niðavellir...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Though it's incredible that Reginn
managed to climb this mountain
on her own...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Right. I thought we would catch
up to her right away. It's strange...$k$pAnd since we know the tower is
guarded, it's almost unthinkable
that she'd attempt this by herself.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We've seen no sign of battle thus
far, so we can only assume she is
still somewhere ahead of us.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I suppose you're right. All we can
do is trust she's safe and keep
heading toward the tower.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE09_04,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|There she is! Princess Reginn!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Oh, you...you followed me!?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Of course we did! You don't have
to do this alone.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-I'm sorry. It's just...I've caused
you all so much trouble already...$k$pI wanted to take care of this one
thing myself... I just thought I'd—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|After everything we've been
through together?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|This isn't a problem that concerns
you alone, or even just Niðavellir,
for that matter.$k$pYou don't need to take it on all
by yourself. You can trust us to
help you.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|After spending all this time together,
I've started to think of you like my
little sister, Reginn.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Let your Big Sis help you out!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|...As the proper elder sister here,
if you need someone you can count
on, your best choice is me.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn, you are a valued
member of our Order of Heroes,
and in light of that...$k$pI will not accept you going on any
dangerous missions by yourself
from here on!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Thank you.
All of you...$k$p$EFace_Cry|You...you're all so wonderful!$k$p*sniff* You're going to make me cry!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|All that said, you have done rather
well climbing this mountain on your
own, haven't you?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|*sniff* ...Oh, that's right!$k$pI heard this strange voice, and
I followed after it... I hardly even
noticed the climb!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|A strange voice? We didn't hear
anything like that...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Oh... Really? Hmm... Maybe I was
imagining things!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Brother! You're all right! I thought...
Weren't you taken captive by Askr?!$k$p...I'm so glad to see you! You had me
worried. I never thought you would
invade Askr while I was away.$k$p$EFace_Anger|And Reginn... Unbelievable! How dare
she side with Askr and aid them in
capturing you!$k$pShe is no sister of mine... No, not
anymore. Don't you agree, Brother?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What endless yammering...$k$pSILENCE!$k$pAskr... The gate, it... What's on the
other side?! ...Damn it!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Brother... Have you...remembered
something? What is it?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...Hm. I've noticed you've been
fixated on Askr recently, haven't
you, Ótr?$k$p...What do you know?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|M-me? ...I-I don't know anything!
What do you mean, Brother?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Don't play the fool with me. Do you
think your sneaking around with Eitri
has gone unnoticed?!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$EFace_Pain|Hhng— Gyaahh! My...head!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Brother, try to calm yourself!
You mustn't try to force your
memories to return.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It is more than my memory that's
wrong... My strength is far beyond
that of others...$k$pSometimes, it is too much for even
me to control... I have this thirst for
destruction that I cannot satisfy...$k$pWhen...when did I become this?!$k$pHrrk! Guhhh...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|You haven't changed, Brother...
That strength is what made you
king, and king by right!$k$pYou need not worry.$k$pI'm here with you. I won't abandon
you like Reginn has, that traitorous,
conniving...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Mmrrgh... H-huh? ...Wh-what is this?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ah, there you are... Are you back
with me now?$k$pYou're likely exhausted after
having escaped Askr... You lost
consciousness for a moment.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Ah, that's right... That woman, Loki...
She appeared to me in Askr, and...$k$pÓtr, begin preparing to invade
a new target.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|...O-of course! What target?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile|The Emblian Empire.$k$p$Sbs150|
